messages.subject: Our RPG

messages.messageBody:
Yes it' me again---quite the little spammer I am today eh? ^_^

Anyway for those who may not know, we have a role playing game over on
LiveJournal. We've just started "round 2" and there are a lot of
openings for both Shinsengumi characters as well as Ishin Shishi you can
use a character from any "universe" of your choosing anime/manga/film
but there can only be one "incarnation" in play.

If you have any questions or think you'd like to play and would like
info on how to join feel free to email any of our moderators listed
below or pop an IM to me: bsher213 on both AIM and Yahoo.

Warg3791@...

bsher213@...

mindglue@...

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://barbarasheridan.blogspot.com/
